trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around February 27th 2009
Summary: came out of a cloud white circle hovering came slowly closer got to where i could see more detail spinning outer right inner left.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside facing the street on my proch which is on the side of my home seens the house is sideways on a hill across a cemetary. It was night I was feeling very, very sad just looking up at the sky, out of a cloud a white round sphere came out it then began to slowly cum down hovering over in front of me, I began to see details spnning outer right spinning iner left not completly clear it was covered in a white glow fog like with some flashing within it, I wondered calmly do I call the police? who do you call?? The way i was feeling I didn't care I just stayed there looking, waiting? it then went to the right slowly then fast I could not see it anymore my neighbors trees blocked my view i got up to see if I could still see, I wasn't sad anymore I was happy "WOW" what a sight! I told two friends the next day they laughed
